title: Product Testing Manager (Remote, E-commerce)
job_overview:
About the Role:

We are seeking a detail-oriented and results-driven Product Testing Manager to lead the testing and quality assurance of our e-commerce products. You will be responsible for ensuring that every product listed on our platforUpgrade to see actual infoets strict quality, functionality, safety, and performance standards before it reaches our customers. This role bridges product development, supplier quality, merchandising, and customer experience.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and implement end-to-end testing protocols for new and existing products.

Manage in-house or third-party product testing processes (e.g. durability, usability, compliance).

Collaborate with sourcing, merchandising, and customer service teams to define product quality benchmarks.

Analyze customer reviews and return data to identify product performance issues.

Work with suppliers and manufacturers to resolve quality issues and ensure compliance with standards (e.g. ISO, CE, CPSIA).

Document all test results and quality checks in a centralized system.

Lead continuous improvement initiatives for product testing workflows.

Stay updated on industry regulations and testing requirements.


What We’re Looking For:

? Years of experience in product testing or quality assurance
? Experience in e-commerce or consumer goods
? Familiarity with industry compliance standards
? Strong communication and analytical skills
